detaileddescription.para: The UV for the outer part of the border.
The UV for the inner part of the border.
Tells if the border has changed, in any way.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the absolute overlay borders size, in pixels.
Retrieves the absolute overlay borders size.

simplesect.para: true if this overlay's has changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets the borders outer part UV.

parameterdescription.para: The new value (left, top, right and bottom)

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the borders outer part UV.

simplesect.para: The value (left, top, right and bottom)

briefdescription.para: Sets the borders inner part UV.

parameterdescription.para: The new value (left, top, right and bottom)

briefdescription.para: Creation function, used by the factory.
Updates the overlay size, taking care of wanted pixel size.
